mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (IDX, replytext, replyer, regdate, updatedate) VALUES (#{IDX}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, sysdate(), sysdate())
mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_idx as replyidx, r.IDX, r.replytext, r.replyer, m.user_name AS userName, r.regdate, r.updatedate FROM tbl_reply r, tbl_member m WHERE r.replyer = m.user_id AND IDX=#{IDX} ORDER BY reply_idx
